root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 8-10-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: This indicator corresponds to the global SDG target “ 8.10.1: (a) Number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults and (b) number of automated teller machines (ATMs) per 100,000 adults ”.
Chỉ tiêu này tương ứng với chỉ tiêu SDG toàn cầu “8.10.1: (a) Number of commercial bank branches per 100,000 adults and (b) number of automated teller machines (ATMs) per 100,000 adults”.
